appDesc.message: Add AI answers to Google Search (powered by Google Gemma + GPT-4o!)

tooltip_feelingLucky.message: Mi pilim olsem mi gat gutpela blesing

tooltip_copy.message: Salim kopi i go long klipbod / kopi

helptip_proxyAPImode.message: Wokim wanpela Proxy API bilong no-login access long AI

helptip_streamingMode.message: Kisim bekim long wanpela tok i stap oltaim

helptip_autoGetAnswers.message: Ol i save salim ol askim long GoogleGPT taim ol i yusim search engine

helptip_autoFocusChatbar.message: Auto-focus chatbar taim em i kamap

helptip_autoScroll.message: Ol bekim bilong ol auto-scroll olsem ol i kamapim long streaming mode

helptip_showRelatedQueries.message: Toksave long ol askim i stap daunbilo long chatbar

helptip_prefixMode.message: Kisim "/" paslain long ol askim bilong kisim bekim bilong soim

helptip_suffixMode.message: Kisim "?" bihain long ol askim long bekim bilong soim

helptip_widerSidebar.message: Long sait bilong painim ol samting long hap bilong graun

helptip_stickySidebar.message: Dispela i mekim GoogleGPT i kamap ples klia long sait bilong ol samting, maski yu save skrapim ol samting

helptip_anchorMode.message: GoogleGPT i go daun long windo

helptip_bgAnimations.message: Show animated backgrounds in UI components

helptip_fgAnimations.message: Ol piksa bilong piksa long ol samting bilong UI

helptip_replyLanguage.message: Tokples bilong bekim tok long Google

helptip_colorScheme.message: Skema bilong soim ol samting bilong GoogleGPT UI long

helptip_debugMode.message: Toksave long ol samting long sait bilong browser

placeholder_askSomethingElse.message: Mi laik askim yu long wanpela samting moa

alert_instead.message: tasol ol i no mekim olsem

alert_isOnlyAvailFor.message: em i stap long rot bilong

alert_userscriptMgrNoStream.message: Man bilong lukautim ol usercript bilong yu i no save sapotim bekim bilong ol tok i kam bek

alert_isCurrentlyOnlyAvailBy.message: long nau, ol i save yusim ol dispela samting long mekim wok bilong

alert_openAIsupportSoon.message: Ol i laik bai ol i ken helpim ol long mekim ol samting bilong helpim ol long kamap gutpela

alert_tooManyRequests.message: ChatGPT i pulap long planti askim

alert_parseFailed.message: Ol i no inap skelim bekim bilong JSON
